title: Capitalization
statement:
Capitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter. Your task is to capitalize the given word.

Note, that during capitalization all the letters except the first one remains unchanged.
input: A single line contains a non-empty word. This word consists of lowercase and uppercase English letters. The length of the word will not exceed 10<sup>3</sup>.
output: Output the given word after capitalization.
note: In the first example, the first letter is already capitalized, so the word remains unchanged. In the second example, 'k' is capitalized to 'K', while all other letters remain the same.
